headline: MarketAxess Q4 Earnings Beat on Strong Emerging Markets Volumes
summary: MKTX's fourth-quarter results reflect solid trading volumes in Eurobonds and emerging markets, driving commission revenues. Elevated marketing and advertising expenses partially offset the results.

headline: Here's What Key Metrics Tell Us About MarketAxess (MKTX) Q4 Earnings
summary: While the top- and bottom-line numbers for MarketAxess (MKTX) give a sense of how the business performed in the quarter ended December 2024, it could be worth looking at how some of its key metrics compare to Wall Street estimates and year-ago values.

headline: MarketAxess' fourth quarter profit falls on hit from Treasury investments
summary: The hit countered gains from higher commissions MarketAxess pocketed as investors proactively optimized portfolios to manage risk, boosting trading volumes.  Shifting expectations of interest rate cuts kept the Treasury market active as investors assessed the impact of inflation data and a new administration.  Total credit average daily volumes — a measure of the average daily number of bond transactions on MarketAxess' platform — rose 6% from a year ago to $13.88 billion.

headline: MarketAxess (MKTX) Q4 Earnings Top Estimates
summary: MarketAxess (MKTX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 1.76% and 0.47%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: MarketAxess: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: NEW YORK (AP) — MarketAxess Holdings Inc. MKTX) on Thursday reported fourth-quarter profit of $65.1 million. On a per-share basis, the New York-based company said it had profit of $1.73.

headline: MarketAxess Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Financial Results
summary: NEW YORK, February 06, 2025--MarketAxess Holdings Inc. (Nasdaq: MKTX), the operator of a leading electronic trading platform for fixed-income securities, today announced financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2024.
